name: Iron and Flower Petals
description:
Audio and visual content in this game was made by RPG Maker studios, not me. This game contains flashing lights, off colour language, and references to difficult subject matter. The game comes with a manual included in the ZIP file.

You play as Joline, a young woman whose recently moved in with her friend Pinter in a new village. Looking for a new life, you control Joline's destiny.

You can chose from a variety of classes to play as, giving you access to different skills, armours, and weapons.

The combat in this game is turn based, where you can have up to 4 party members fight for you.

You can join different guilds and organisations and complete their quest lines, uncover dark truths about magic and help protect innocent civilians from gangs of bandits and monsters looking to cause chaos.

You can also find love! With 5 different suitors to chose from (2 women, 3 men) you can get married and start a family of your very own! Much like in games such as Harvest Moon giving gifts to suitors will raise their love for you, and engaging in Affection Events can get you two closer than ever!

You also chose Joline's backstories: she could be a fighter from distant lands, a merchant looking to make her fortune, a woman from a bad home life looking to escape it all. When suitors ask about your life you can chose how to answer.
